title: Inflation Tops 10% on Key Items That Americans Just Can't Avoid
itunes:title: Inflation Tops 10% on Key Items That Americans Just Can't Avoid
description:
Tamar Mendelson, Director of the Center for Adolescent Health at the Johns Hopkins Bloomberg School of Public Health, discusses the impact of school shootings on the mental health of children. Bloomberg Businessweek Editor Joel Weber and Bloomberg News Wealth Team Reporter Sophie Alexander share the details of Sophie's Businessweek Magazine cover story Larry Ellison’s Hawaii Paradise Is Infuriating Locals. Bloomberg News U.S. Economy Reporter Olivia Rockeman explains how utilities, gasoline and grocery prices have been rising at double-digit levels all spring and it’s probably about to get worse. And we Drive to the Close with Ryan Detrick, Chief Market Strategist at LPL Financial.
Hosts: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer: Paul Brennan. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
